languages.text: {n}Тело Злобы страшно истерзано, одна из рук почти оторвана и болтается на сухожилиях. Человек давно бы умер от таких ран, но Злоба, кажется, еще даже не на последнем издыхании.{/n} "Смейся, людишко. Ты победил{mf||а}. Так живут на шпилях — помогающего тебе предай".

{n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."
languages.original_text: {n}Тело Злобы страшно истерзано, одна из рук почти оторвана и болтается на сухожилиях. Человек давно бы умер от таких ран, но Злоба, кажется, еще даже не на последнем издыхании.{/n} "Смейся, людишко. Ты победил{mf||а}. Так живут на шпилях — помогающего тебе предай".

'Betray he who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

languages.text: {n}マリスは全身無惨な傷で覆われている。片腕は今にもちぎれそうで、筋でようやくつながっている。人間ならとっくに死んでいるような傷だが、マリスは最期を迎えているようにも見えない。{/n}「笑うがいい、人間よ。貴様の勝ちだ。『汝を助ける者を裏切れ』…それが尖塔での生き方だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスは全身無惨な傷で覆われている。片腕は今にもちぎれそうで、筋でようやくつながっている。人間ならとっくに死んでいるような傷だが、マリスは最期を迎えているようにも見えない。{/n}「笑うがいい、人間よ。貴様の勝ちだ。『汝を助ける者を裏切れ』…それが尖塔での生き方だ」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}恶棍全身上下覆满了鲜血淋漓的伤口。他的一条胳膊几乎被扯了下来，此刻只靠肌腱吊在身上。如果换做是人类受了这么重的伤，恐怕早就一命呜呼了，但恶棍看起来离咽气还远呢。{/n}“开怀大笑吧，小人儿，是你赢了。‘要背叛帮助你的人’，尖塔上的生活就是这个样子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍全身上下覆满了鲜血淋漓的伤口。他的一条胳膊几乎被扯了下来，此刻只靠肌腱吊在身上。如果换做是人类受了这么重的伤，恐怕早就一命呜呼了，但恶棍看起来离咽气还远呢。{/n}“开怀大笑吧，小人儿，是你赢了。‘你要背叛那些帮助你的人’，尖塔上的生活就是这个样子。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Todo el cuerpo de Malicia está cubierto de heridas espantosas. Uno de sus brazos fue casi arrancado y ahora cuelga de los tendones. Un humano habría muerto hace tiempo por esas heridas, pero Malicia ni siquiera parece estar en las últimas.{/n} «Ríete, human{mf|o|a}. Has ganado. "Traiciona a quien te ayuda". Así es la vida en las torres».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Todo el cuerpo de Malicia está cubierto de heridas espantosas. Uno de sus brazos fue casi arrancado y ahora cuelga de los tendones. Un humano habría muerto hace tiempo por esas heridas, pero Malicia ni siquiera parece estar en las últimas.{/n} «Ríete, human{mf|o|a}. Has ganado. "Traiciona a quien te ayuda". Así es la vida en las torres».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Tückes gesamter Körper ist übersät von grauenhaften Wunden. Einer seiner Arme wurde beinahe abgerissen und hängt nur noch an einer Sehne. Ein Mensch wäre solchen Verletzungen längst erlegen, aber Tücke sieht nicht einmal aus, als wäre am Ende seiner Kräfte.{/n} "Lacht nur, Menschling. Ihr habt gewonnen. 'Hintergehe deinen Helfer' ... So ist das Leben in den Türmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tückes gesamter Körper ist übersät von grauenhaften Wunden. Einer seiner Arme wurde beinahe abgerissen und hängt nur noch an einer Sehne. Ein Mensch wäre solchen Verletzungen längst erlegen, aber Tücke sieht nicht einmal aus, als wäre am Ende seiner Kräfte.{/n} "Lacht nur, Menschling. Ihr habt gewonnen. 'Den veraten, der dir hilft'. So ist das Leben in den Türmen."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Malice souffre de nombreuses blessures, et l'un de ses bras, presque complètement arraché, pend mollement le long de son corps. Aucun être humain n'aurait survécu à de telles blessures, mais Malice ne semble pas s'en soucier.{/n} « Riez, {mf|humain|humaine}, moquez-vous. Vous avez gagné. Mordre la main qui vous vient en aide. C'est ça, la vie dans les tours. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malice a le corps mutilé, et l'un de ses bras, presque complètement arraché, pend mollement le long de son corps. Aucun être humain n'aurait survécu à de telles blessures, mais Malice n'a pas l'air de tellement s'en soucier.{/n} « Riez, {mf|humain|humaine}, riez. Vous avez gagné. Mordre la main qui vous vient en aide. C'est ça, la vie dans les tours. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Melanet'in tüm vücudu, dehşet verici yaralarla kaplı. Kollarından biri neredeyse komple koparılmış, sadece kas telleriyle bağlı duruyor. Yerinde bir insan olsaydı bu çoktan ölürdü ama Melanet, bir ayağı çukurdaymış gibi bile durmuyor.{/n} "İstediğin kadar gülebilirsin insancık. Sen kazandın. 'Besle kargayı, oysun gözünü'... Kulelerde hayat böyledir."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice's entire body is covered in grisly wounds. One of his arms has been nearly torn off and is now hanging by sinew. A human would have long since died from such injuries, but Malice does not even look like he is on his last legs.{/n} "Laugh away, humanling. You've won. 'Betray the one who aids you' — that's life in the spires."

traits.locale_text: {n}Melanet'in tüm vücudu, dehşet verici yaralarla kaplı. Kollarından biri neredeyse komple koparılmış, sadece kas telleriyle bağlı. Yerinde bir insan olsaydı bu yaralardan çoktan ölmüştü ama Melanet bir ayağı çukurdaymış gibi bile durmuyor.{/n} "İstediğin kadar gülebilirsin insancık. Sen kazandın. 'Besle kargayı, oysun gözünü'... Kulelerde yaşamak böyle bir şey."
traits.speaker: Anger
